guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"8u2fi","text":"CAUTION: Elevated temperatures, excessive amounts of enzyme, failure to supplement with dNTPs or long reaction times will result in recessed ends due to the 3´ → 5´ exonuclease activity of the enzyme. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6631s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7sven","text":"T4 DNA Polymerase can be used in NEBuffers 1.1, 2.1, and CutSmart Buffer as well as NEBuffers 1, 2, and 4 and T4 DNA Ligase Reaction Buffer. Optimal activity is observed in NEBuffer 2.1. BSA supplementation is recommended when using a buffer that does not already contain BSA. {"blocks":[{"key":"5esrc","text":"Add 1 unit of T4 DNA Polymerase per microgram DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6d7qq","text":"Stop reaction by adding EDTA to a final concentration of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6la7l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"85an3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"10","guid":"87C9BAA09F3111EA956D59EAE51959A7","id":0,"label":"","unit":28}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4plu7","text":"See references 1, 2 for information on stopping reaction using EDTA and 75°C.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
